data.title: Robert Mcmullan Net Worth (2024)
data.meta_description: Robert has made over 11 trades of the Bancroft Fund Ltd stock since 2005, according to the Form 4 filled with the SEC. Most recently Robert sold 15,000 units of BCV stock worth $253,650 on 20 November 2018.
data.text:
The estimated Net Worth of Robert Mcmullan is at least $3.23 Million dollars as of 20 November 2018. Robert Mcmullan owns over 15,000 units of Bancroft Fund Ltd stock worth over $861,475 and over the last 20 years Robert sold BCV stock worth over $2,370,719.

Robert Mcmullan BCV stock SEC Form 4 insiders trading

Robert has made over 11 trades of the Bancroft Fund Ltd stock since 2005, according to the Form 4 filled with the SEC. Most recently Robert sold 15,000 units of BCV stock worth $253,650 on 20 November 2018.

The largest trade Robert's ever made was exercising 30,000 units of Bancroft Fund Ltd stock on 16 May 2017 worth over $525,000. On average, Robert trades about 3,798 units every 202 days since 2005. As of 20 November 2018 Robert still owns at least 52,561 units of Bancroft Fund Ltd stock.

You can see the complete history of Robert Mcmullan stock trades at the bottom of the page.

What does Bancroft Fund Ltd do?

gamco investors, inc. (nyse:gbl) is a well-established provider of investment advisory services to open and closed-end funds, institutional, and private wealth management investors. since mario j. gabelli founded the firm in 1977, gamco has been recognized for its research driven approach to equity investing and our proprietary private market value (pmv) with a catalyst™ stock selection strategy. as of december 31, 2016, the company has $39.7 billion aum, 95% of which is invested in equities, principally through our two registered investment advisers: gamco asset management inc. (“institutional and private wealth management”) and gabelli funds, llc (“funds”). g.distributors, llc (“g.distributors”) acts as an underwriter and distributor for our open-end funds.
